class.name: prx_planning/uniform_sampler
class.description: Samples uniformly in the space

class.name: prx_planning/apc_sampler
class.description: apc sampler for transit/tranfer points

class.name: prx_planning/visualization_comm
class.description: Default communication between planning and visualization.

class.name: prx_planning/simulation_comm
class.description: Default communication between planning and simulation.

class.name: prx_planning/planning_comm
class.description: Default communication initiated by planning.

class.name: prx_planning/single_query_application
class.description: Top level application class that reasons over a single query

class.name: prx_planning/base_apc_planning_application
class.description: APC application

class.name: prx_planning/motoman_planning_application
class.description: motoman APC application

class.name: prx_planning/grasp_test_planning_application
class.description: Application for testing different grasping positions

class.name: prx_planning/motoman_precomputing_application
class.description: motoman APC PRECOMPUTATION application

class.name: prx_planning/ground_truth_query_application
class.description: A planning application that receives and is reason about ground truth

class.name: prx_planning/single_shot
class.description: Performs single shot planning queries.

class.name: prx_planning/base_apc_task_planner
class.description: The task planner for the APC

class.name: prx_planning/multi_planner
class.description: Performs multiple motion planners in sequence, gathering statistics.

class.name: prx_planning/replanning_planner
class.description: Performs replanning.

class.name: prx_planning/prm_star
class.description: Probabilistic Roadmap Method.

class.name: prx_planning/apc_planner
class.description: The APC planner.

class.name: prx_planning/rrt
class.description: Randomly-exploring Random Tree.

class.name: prx_planning/anytime_rrt
class.description: Anytime RRT

class.name: prx_planning/rrtc
class.description: RRT-connect, a bi-directional, greedy tree algorithm.

class.name: prx_planning/rrt_star
class.description: RRT* (Sampling-based Algorithms for Optimal Motion Planning Karaman,Frazzoli)

class.name: prx_planning/sst
class.description: SST (Stable Sparse-RRT)

class.name: prx_planning/isst
class.description: iSST (Informed Stable Sparse-RRT)

class.name: prx_planning/world_model_validity_checker
class.description: Uses the world model to check the validity of states.

class.name: prx_planning/near_collision_validity_checker
class.description: Ensures states are valid within a certain clearance threshold.

class.name: prx_planning/ignore_list_validity_checker
class.description: This checker can load a list of collisions which do not invalidate states.

class.name: prx_planning/temporal_validity_checker
class.description: Relies on informed trajectories to determine invalid states.

class.name: prx_planning/approach_local_planner
class.description: Uses the world model propagate to create local plans.

class.name: prx_planning/time_varying_local_planner
class.description: Uses the world model propagate to create local plans with a random amount of time for propagation.

class.name: prx_planning/gradient_descent_local_planner
class.description: Performs a gradient descent to improve controls

class.name: prx_planning/bvp_local_planner
class.description: Connects two states with the steering_function in simulator.

class.name: prx_planning/apc_local_planner
class.description: APC local planner that checks if the trajectory is inside the shelf.

class.name: prx_planning/shortcut_smoother
class.description: Performs smoothing by finding shortcuts.

class.name: prx_planning/prm_astar
class.description: Performs heuristic search on a graph constructed by PRM.

class.name: prx_planning/timed_criterion
class.description: Will signal a stop when the allotted time runs out.

class.name: prx_planning/log_timed_criterion
class.description: Will signal a stop when the allotted time runs out. Also scales the time up for subsequent checks.

class.name: prx_planning/iteration_criterion
class.description: Will signal a stop when the number of iterations is reached

class.name: prx_planning/goal_criterion
class.description: Will signal a stop when the allotted time runs out.

class.name: prx_planning/succeeded_criterion
class.description: Will signal a stop when the linked motion planner's succeeded() function returns true.

class.name: prx_planning/multi_planner_query
class.description: A query for multiple motion_planning_querys.

class.name: prx_planning/motion_planning_query
class.description: A query for results from a motion planner.

class.name: prx_planning/single_shot_query
class.description: A query for results from a single shot task planner.

class.name: prx_planning/multi_planner_specification
class.description: A specification for multiple motion_planning_specifications.

class.name: prx_planning/motion_planning_specification
class.description: A specification for a motion planner.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_application
class.description: An application for the manipulation problems.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_tp
class.description: A task planner for a simple manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/manip_sampler
class.description: A sampler for sampling a manipulator with an object.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_query
class.description: The query for the manipulation problem.

class.name: prx_planning/manipulation_specification
class.description: The problem specification for the manipulation problem.
